title: Getting Banned For No Reason
body: MY THOUGHT IS THAT YOU SHOULD BE MORE CAREFUL WHEN CLICKING ON THE BAN BUTTON

replies.body: I can't see any time ban on your account, are you referring to your leaverbuster low priority queue punishment?

Yeah
Um, when I started playing league there was bans at that time and so i always used the term "Bans" XD

Hey there,

What was the reason for your ban?
Have you already [submitted a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support?

Roit send you a reason for your ban. what did it say?

Are you a toxic player?
Are you using 3rd party programs?
Do you afk a lot?
PLAYER SUPPORT IS FUCKING SHIT THEY JUST COPY PASTE SHIT INTO UR TICKETS THEY DONT CARE IF U GET REPORTED FOR NOTHING
